msg: Add detailed help screen to commands.
AddCollection can create new collections from configuration file

author: jdillon
msg: Use method to simplify the --quiet,--debug,--verbose processing
Set the short version of the above to -q, -d and -v

author: jdcasey
msg: Removing some sysout statements from the main codebase, and adding some debugging aspects for performance, stats, and tracing info, which can be enabled by building with -Paspects (the aspects profile enabled). You'll also have to use various system properties (currently the fastest solution I could find) to trigger the various types of output.

author: sebb
msg: Fix NPE in unit tests (previously unseen because null != evt.getSource())
